contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish|Napoleon}} {{wiktionary|Neapolitan}} '''Neapolitan''' may refer to: * Neapolitan - of or pertaining to the city of [[Naples|Naples, Italy]] and sometimes its wider [[Duchy of Naples|Duchy]] or [[Province of Naples]] ** Previously a nationality, during the time of the [[Kingdom of Naples]], the [[Kingdom of the Two Sicilies]] or the [[Neapolitan Republic (disambiguation)|Neapolitan Republics]] * [[Neapolitan dialect]], recognized by [[UNESCO]] as a [[Neapolitan language|language]], it is spoken in Naples and environs, in southern Italy * Neapolitan music, [[Music of Naples]] * Neapolitan song, [[Canzone Napoletana]] * [[Neapolitan school]] of music * [[Neapolitan chord]] (also known as Neapolitan sixth), in music, is the first inversion of a major chord built on the lowered second (supertonic) scale degree * [[Neapolitan scale]] * [[Neapolitan piastra]], a currency of the mainland part of the former Kingdom of the Two Sicilies * [[Neapolitan horse]], an extinct horse breed formerly bred in Naples * [[Neapolitan Mastiff]], a large, ancient breed of dog * [[Neapolitan cuisine]] * [[Neapolitan pizza]], a variety of [[pizza]] made according to strict rules * [[Neapolitan ragÃ¹]] * [[Neapolitan sauce]], a basic tomato-based sauce derived from Italian cuisine * [[Napolitan]], the name of a pasta dish, which is popular in Japan * [[Neapolitan ice cream]], a mixture of chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry ice cream side-by-side in the same container * [[Neapolitan wafer]], an Austrian wafer and chocolate-cream sandwich biscuit * [[Neapolitan War]] ==See also== * {{lookfrom}} * {{intitle}} * [[Neapolitan Republic (disambiguation)]] * [[Napoleon (dessert)]] {{disambiguation}} [[es:Napolitano]]
